head.supplied: Melbourne botan. Gardens ¶ October 21st 1864 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you, that the letter adressed to you by the Board of Land & Works on the 19th October ¶ has been submitted to the Tr...

div.p: A345 Royal Park Zoological Society letter and minute book, p. 16-17, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

I have the honor to inform you, that the letter adressed to you by the Board of Land & Works on the 19th October
Letter not found. has been submitted to the Trustees of the Royal Park, who direct me to inform you, that at a Meeting of the Trustees held on the 14th October the byefollowing resolution was passed

That the Honorary Secretary be instructed to adress the Honorable the Chief Secretary, praying that the sum of five hundred pounds, £500.0.0. be placed upon the Estimates for 1865, to be applied by the Trustees of the Royal Park in needful repairs, maintenance & improvements to the said Park.
M had written to the Chief Secretary, as instructed, the same day; see M to J. McCulloch, 14 October 1864.
